short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Moder: Chrome extension for seamless dark and light mode switching. Elevate your browsing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Dark Moder - a Chrome extension that transforms your browsing! Switch effortlessly between dark and light modes on any site. Elevate your experience with Dark Moder!
